item.title: James McMahon's Resume
item.description: Experienced Staff Engineer with a startup background, specializing in Test-Driven Development (TDD), lean practices, and Extreme Programming (XP) agile methodologies. Skilled in leading teams, building greenfield applications, modernizing legacy systems, and mentoring engineers to deliver impactful, high-quality software.
